subject: Account locked after failed attempts
description: My account got locked out after I entered wrong password. I know the correct password now but system won't let me try again. Please unlock my account immediately.

subject: Application crashes on startup
description: The desktop application crashes immediately when I try to open it. Error message says 'Unexpected error occurred'. I've tried reinstalling but same issue persists.

subject: Unexpected charge on my credit card
description: I noticed a charge of $99.99 on my statement that I don't recognize. My subscription should only be $49.99 per month. Please explain this extra charge.

subject: Mobile app for iOS
description: Your Android app is great but there's no iOS version. Many of our team members use iPhones and would benefit from a native iOS app. When can we expect this?

subject: Email notifications arriving hours late
description: I'm receiving email notifications 4-6 hours after the actual events. The system timestamp is correct but email delivery is severely delayed.

subject: Partnership opportunity
description: I run a complementary SaaS business and think there could be partnership opportunities between our companies. Would you be open to a discussion about integration?
